alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 15 at 4:14AM MDT until October 16 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...East winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts of 50 to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. These strong winds will be focused below Tijeras Canyon and across the east side of Albuquerque. * WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
